info.name: Choroid fissure
info.description: The choroid fissure is C-shaped.  It is located on the medial aspect of each cerebral hemisphere, adjacent to the choroid plexus of the inferior horn of the lateral ventricle.
info.item: /Sections/Thin, Whole Brain/Sagittal & Parasagittal/6 Sag Thin Sec
/Sections/Thin, Whole Brain/Sagittal & Parasagittal/7 Sag Thin Sec
